Name: Workplace Rhapsody
About the game: There is an old Chinese saying : “Only the weak f*** women. Real men should f*** men”. updated now Newcomers who have just graduated from university and are preparing to enter the workplace have gone through repeated selections and successfully joined a senior underwear design company. How to interact with people in the company has become his biggest problem. Get the hearts of all women in the company? Players grow newcomers and get information about colleagues in the company through the company with colleagues. According to the employees, get the corresponding gifts to get the greatest effect. The next day will import the goodwill of the story, if the goodwill is 0, you need to fight with your companions to strive for the goodness of growth. Mei: The company colleague, the pink girl with a slim antenna, is very friendly to the protagonist and is a kind girl. Bobo: The plump and round run cleaner, the most well-informed person in the company, the husband is in the country, and it seems that there is no married life. Ling: Treasurer, long legs, fair-skinned, cups, mothers with eyes. XiaoCui: In a prosperous city, there is a village in the city, a dark red shampoo room, and a senior girl.
